title: River Raisin National Battlefield Park: Volunteer
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer            Volunteer           River Raisin National Battlefield Park V.I.P. Program   River Raisin National Battlefield Park always offers volunteer opportunities at the Park. Please consider joining the National Park Service V.I.P. (Volunteer In Parks) Program and join over 120,000 other VIP's who donate over 4 million hours of service to the park service each year. The program was authorized in 1970 and is now an American Tradition.   We are looking for passionate people to help in a variety of areas such as interpretation, education, marketing, administration, maintenance, resource management, archaeology, special events, and much more! Please call the Park today to find out more at 734-243-7136.     Thank You for helping us provide an inheritance for future generations, without you we will not succeed!
